v.0.03 Alpha


Оставил только анимашки, когда новый дизайн выйдет в релиз, может допилю всё остальное.

style_setting_options.value: .market_like_icon,.pv_like_icon,.wall_module .like_icon,.wall_module .post_like .post_like_icon{background:url("data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg fill='rgba(255, 0, 51, 1)' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' width='24' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path d='M0 0h24v24H0z' fill='none'/><path d='M12 21.35l-1.45-1.32C5.4 15.36 2 12.28 2 8.5 2 5.42 4.42 3 7.5 3c1.74 0 3.41.81 4.5 2.09C13.09 3.81 14.76 3 16.5 3 19.58 3 22 5.42 22 8.5c0 3.78-3.4 6.86-8.55 11.54L12 21.35z'/></svg>") center center no-repeat!important;background-size:100%!important;opacity:.5!important;transition:all .24s ease-in-out}.like_wrap.my_like .like_icon,.post_like.my_like .post_like_icon,.post_like:hover .post_like_icon,.wall_module .like_icon:hover{opacity:1!important}
